item.title: Making a funPk
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

So here’s my guide on making a FunPK in Project Insanity.

Yes I know it’s easy, but i’m bored and I felt like posting a tut.

Post/Rep/Thanks if you’re gonna use l0l

src.server.model.players.Player.java

Under

public int pitsStatus = 0;

Add

[Code]
/**

  • Fun Pk
    */
    public boolean inFunPk = false;
    Above

Code:
public boolean inMulti() {
Add
Code:
public boolean inFunPk() {
if(absX > 2510 && absX < 2545 && absY > 4764 && absY < 4795) {
return true;
}
return false;
}
In
[/Cod[/code]
